data.persona: I am dressed nicely each day.  I love to dress up.  I hope to do justice with each design I wear.
data.description:
You are in the Cottage safe-room.
Stocked from floor to ceiling, food and medicine line the western wall. The room is painted matte grey and contains a chest to the left of the food and medicine. Three chairs and a table with a lamp are what is left in the middle of the safe-room. Dimly lit, and a steady water supply coming from the well outside of the cottage.
There's a chair, a medicine, a food, a table, and a computer here.
The genie is here.

You are carrying a purse, and wearing a dress and a hats.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the attention of the genie
data.mid_motivation: I want the genie to turn me back into a human
data.long_motivation: I want to get revenge on the cottage owner for turning me into a mannequin

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go cottage owner's room to exact revenge
